mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.* FROM ${uTableName} a,${pbTableName} c,${phTableName} d,${rdprTableName} e,${rdprTableName} e1,${dpTableName} f,${dpTableName} f1, ${rTableName} g,${rTableName} g1,${urrTableName} h,${urrTableName} h1 WHERE (a.`ID`=h.`USER_ID` AND h.`ROLE_ID`=g.`ID` AND g.`ID`=e.`ROLE_ID` AND e.`DATA_PRIVILEGE_ID`=f.`ID` AND f.`DATA_TYPE_ID`=#{pDataTypeId} AND f.`DATA_ID`=#{procedureId}) AND (a.`ID`=h1.`USER_ID` AND h1.`ROLE_ID`=g1.`ID` AND g1.`ID`=e1.`ROLE_ID` AND e1.`DATA_PRIVILEGE_ID`=f1.`ID` AND f1.`DATA_TYPE_ID`=#{gDataTypeId} AND f1.`DATA_ID`=d.`ID` AND d.`BUILDING_ID`=c.`ID` AND c.`PROJECT_PERIOD_ID`=#{projectPeriodId}) AND a.`IS_SEALED`=0 AND c.`IS_SEALED`=0 AND d.`IS_SEALED`=0 AND f.`IS_SEALED`=0 AND f1.`IS_SEALED`=0 AND g.`IS_SEALED`=0 AND g1.`IS_SEALED`=0 AND a.`TENANT_ID`=#{tenantId} AND a.`POST_ID`=#{postId}
